Service Details: - Offers an inclusive group which reflects the ideas and goals of the participating men- Increases men's well-being by fostering social connections and increasing self-esteem through participation in meaningful community projects, group projects or personal tasks- Creates a safe place for men to network with others of like mind and interest- Effective in helping men combat isolation, share skills and feel valued- Provides a safe, busy environment where men can gather in an atmosphere of old-fashioned friendship
